messages.content: Preetam BalkrishnaJoshi is an Indian journalist and television personality. He is currently working as a newsreader and journalist for news channel ABC News. He has worked for various news channels in the past and has been a part of various news events and debates. He is known for his quick thinking and analysis during the debates and his ability to connect with the audience.

He is also involved in various student organizations and has served as a part of the school\'s student body.
